div.h2: Argonaut Data Query Implemenation Guide Server
div.p: This profile defines the expected capabilities of a server when conforming to the Argonaut Data Query Implementation Guide.

The Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL support the Argonaut Data Query patient resource profile. In addition to the Argonaut Data Query patient, the Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL support at least one additional resource profile from the list of Argonaut Data Query profiles. The Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL implement REST behavior according to the FHIR specification. The Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL support both json and xml resource formats for all Argonaut Data Query interactions.
Argonaut Data Query Servers SHALL implement the security requirements documented in the Argonaut Data Query IG.

a.title: Allows discovery of existing Argonaut Data Query patient resources using different search criteria

Allows retrieval of a historical version of a Argonaut Data Query patient instance
Allows review of changes to Argonaut Data Query patient instance over time

name.value: Argonaut Data Query Implemenation Guide Server

description.value: This profile defines the expected capabilities of a server when conforming to the Argonaut Data Query Implementation Guide.

documentation.value: The Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL support the Argonaut Data Query patient resource profile. In addition to the Argonaut Data Query patient, the Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL support at least one additional resource profile from the list of Argonaut Data Query profiles. The Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL implement REST behavior according to the FHIR specification. The Argonaut Data Query Server SHALL support both json and xml resource formats for all Argonaut Data Query interactions.

description.value: Argonaut Data Query Servers SHALL implement the security requirements documented in the Argonaut Data Query IG.
